broadcastPayload(address,uint8,uint256,b.details: allows core contracts to send payload to all configured destination chain.

params.ambId_: is the identifier of the arbitrary message bridge to be used
params.extraData_: defines all the message bridge related overrides
params.gasFee_: is the gas fee to be used for broadcasting
params.message_: is the crosschain payload to be broadcasted
params.srcSender_: is the caller of the function (used for gas refunds).

processPayload(uint256).details: allows privileged actors to process broadcasted payloads

params.payloadId_: is the identifier of the cross-chain payload

receiveBroadcastPayload(uint64,bytes).details: allows ambs to write broadcasted payloads
